trans-unit.resname: PLST·KHM-50 | Cosima, God of the Voyage | Card Name
PLST·KHM-50 | Cosima, God of the Voyage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile Cosima. If you do, it gains "Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if Cosima is exiled, you may put a voyage counter on it. If you don't, return Cosima to the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it and draw X cards, where X is the number of voyage counters on it."

trans-unit.resname: PLST·KHM-50 | The Omenkeel | Card Name
PLST·KHM-50 | The Omenkeel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Vehicle you control deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles that many cards from the top of their library. You may play lands from among those cards for as long as they remain exiled.\nCrew 1
trans-unit.target:
每当一个由你操控的载具对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手从其牌库顶放逐等量的牌。于这些牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以从其中使用地。
搭载1


神
{2}{U}

trans-unit.resname: PLST·CMR-99 | Sphinx of the Second Sun | Card Name
PLST·CMR-99 | Sphinx of the Second Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PLST·CMR-99 | Sphinx of the Second Sun | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, there is an additional beginning phase after this phase. (The beginning phase includes the untap, upkeep, and draw steps.)
trans-unit.target: 在你战斗后的行动阶段开始时，你在该阶段后额外得到一个开始阶段。（开始阶段包括重置步骤、维持步骤和抓牌步骤。）

trans-unit.resname: PLST·KHM-114 | Valki, God of Lies | Card Name
PLST·KHM-114 | Valki, God of Lies | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When Valki enters the battlefield, each opponent reveals their hand. For each opponent, exile a creature card they revealed this way until Valki leaves the battlefield.\n{X}: Choose a creature card exiled with Valki with mana value X. Valki becomes a copy of that card.
trans-unit.target:
当谎言神瓦尔基进战场时，每位对手各展示其手牌。为每位对手各进行以下流程～放逐一张其以此法展示的生物牌，直到瓦尔基离开战场为止。
{X}：选择一张以瓦尔基放逐且总法术力费用为X的生物牌。瓦尔基成为该牌的复制品。


提勃
{5}{B}{R}

trans-unit.resname: PLST·KHM-114 | Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor | Card Name
PLST·KHM-114 | Tibalt, Cosmic Impostor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
As Tibalt enters the battlefield, you get an emblem with "You may play cards exiled with CARDNAME, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells."
[+2]: Exile the top card of each player's library.
[−3]: Exile target artifact or creature.
[−8]: Exile all graveyards. Add {R}{R}{R}.
trans-unit.target:
于提勃进战场时，你获得具有「你可以使用以寰宇冒名客提勃放逐的牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放这类咒语的费用」的徽记。
+2：放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌。
−3：放逐目标神器或生物。
−8：放逐所有坟墓场中的所有牌。加{R}{R}{R}。


神
{1}{B}

trans-unit.resname: PLST·STX-153 | Mila, Crafty Companion | Card Name
PLST·STX-153 | Mila, Crafty Companion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent attacks one or more planeswalkers you control, put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.\nWhenever a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target:
每当任一对手攻击由你操控的一个或数个鹏洛客时，在每个由你操控的鹏洛客上各放置一个忠诚指示物。
每当一个由你操控的永久物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，你可以抓一张牌。


卢卡
{4}{R}{R}

trans-unit.resname: PLST·STX-153 | Lukka, Wayward Bonder | Card Name
PLST·STX-153 | Lukka, Wayward Bonder | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: [+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. If a creature card was discarded this way, draw two cards instead.\n[−2]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of your next upkeep.\n[−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target."
trans-unit.target:
+1：你可以弃一张牌。如果你如此作，则抓一张牌。如果以此法弃掉一张生物牌，则改为抓两张牌。
-2：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在你的下一个维持开始时，将它放逐。
−7：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，它对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。」


狐
{1}{W}{W}

trans-unit.resname: PLST·STX-155 | Plargg, Dean of Chaos | Card Name
PLST·STX-155 | Plargg, Dean of Chaos | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.\n{4}{R}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary, nonland card with mana value 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target:
{T}，弃一张牌：抓一张牌。
{4}{R}，{T}：从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张法术力值等于或小于3且既非传奇也非地的牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所有以此法展示且未施放的牌依随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.target:
由你操控且已横置的其他生物得+1/+0。
由你操控且未横置的其他生物得+0/+1。
每当你攻击时，重置所有由你操控的生物，然后横置任意数量由你操控的生物。

PLST·MH2-218 | Yusri, Fortune's Flame | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, choose a number between 1 and 5. Flip that many coins. For each flip you win, draw a card. For each flip you lose, Yusri deals 2 damage to you. If you won five flips this way, you may cast spells from your hand this turn without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: 每当命运烈焰亚司利攻击时，选择一个1到5之间的数字。掷等量的硬币。你每猜对一掷，便抓一张牌。你每猜错一掷，亚司利便对你造成2点伤害。如果你以此法猜对五掷，则本回合中，你可以从你手上施放咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。
